content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you looking to schedule an appointment for electrical, plumbing, or HVAC work?
Hi! Yes, I need someone to fix an outlet thatâ€™s not working.
Thank you for reaching out! May I have your name, please, so I can start your appointment request?
Thank you, Kendra! Could you please provide the address where you need the service?
Sure! 8910 Willow Lake Drive, Pine Hill.
Thank you! Let me check if we can provide service to your address.

I'm sorry, but it appears that 8910 Willow Lake Drive, Pine Hill is outside of our service area. Unfortunately, we won't be able to assist with your electrical issue at that location.

If you have another location within our service area, I'd be happy to help. Otherwise, I recommend reaching out to a provider closer to your area. Thank you for considering XYZ Home Services!
